mapper.sql: id, employ_num, employee_name, status, creation_date, update_date
mapper.insert:
insert into c_reviewers
id,
employ_num,
employee_name,
status,
creation_date,
update_date,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{employNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update c_reviewers
employ_num = #{employNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employee_name = #{employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_reviewers set employ_num = #{employNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_name = #{employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT employ_num FROM c_reviewers WHERE status = 'y' and is_delete = 0 ORDER BY id
